nodes.text: A Sith temple in the galaxy was built to honor the Sith Lord Exar Kun, containing obsidian slabs inscribed with Kun's name, as well as hieroglyphs representing warding spells. The temple was plundered by the crime lord Dryden Vos at some point before 10 BBY.[source?] During his plunder, Vos obtained a stone slab carved with the warding spells, as well as an inscription reading "Our temple honouring Sith Lord Exar Kun". Vos had the obsidian mounted into a desk which he kept in his office aboard the yacht First Light.

In the concept art for Solo: A Star Wars Story, the Sith temple Vos plundered was specifically identified as the Temple of Exar Kun. This was confirmed in canon when Twitter user AurekFonts translated the slab's inscription.
